description: This file contains smoke test cases for verifying the core API endpoints of a backend service related to authentication, job management, and progress tracking. It uses pytest and requests to perform HTTP requests and validate responses.

methods.name: str _base()
methods.description: Returns the backend base URL, defaulting to localhost if environment variable is not set.

methods.name: requests.Response _json(session: requests.Session, method: str, path: str, token: str | None = None, body: dict | None = None)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with JSON payload and headers, optionally including an authorization token.

methods.name: test_openapi_route_present_and_json()
methods.description: Smoke test to verify the OpenAPI JSON route is available and returns a valid OpenAPI specification.

methods.name: test_auth_protected_jobs_and_progress_flow()
methods.description: Smoke test to verify the registration, login, job creation, and progress tracking workflows via API.
